titleStmt.title: The Noble fisher-man, or, Robin Hood's preferment shewing how he won a prize on the sea, and how he gave one half to his dame, and the other to the building of alms-houses : tune of, In summer time.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
